description: Upward Mobility’s Six Sigma Green Belt and Black Belt test prep app for Palm webOS contains a targeted curriculum of 299 questions addressing key topics for these important certifications from the American Society for Quality (ASQ).  *  Each question is paired with an explanatory answer and a Key Takeaway.  The Key Takeaway is designed to help the learner master the most important point of the question.  *  This app contains 149 Green Belt questions, and 150 Black Belt questions.  *  This app would also be useful for anyone studying for IASSC's Green Belt and Black Belt certifications, or who wants to improve their general Six Sigma / quality management skills.   ||  The primary editors for the content were Ted Chan, an experienced project manager who holds a MBA from MIT’s Sloan School of Management, and Eric Chan, an ASQ certified industrial engineer.   ||  In many cases, professional training is reimbursable.  Check with your employer or tax accountant to determine if this training module would be for you.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
